title: Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site: Permits
body: Special Use Permits       Please review the information in the documents listed below for guideance on planning your special event or use. Please contact the park before you submit any documents to discuss your event. Procedures and Fees for Planning a Wedding at the Sandburg Home (word) Special Park Uses (.pdf) (example: Weddings, first amendment demonstrations, facility use, special events, etc...) Commercial Filming/Still Photography - short form (.pdf) (one-day or simple events) Commercial Filming/Still Photography - long form (.pdf) (multi-day or complex events)
